rev.desc.rev.desc: add variable for task format when pd enabled
Schedule Maintenance supporting for PD Request
Fixed cm3r source query on query.generate as number in cm3r is now a character data type.
Cleaned up a possible error state if some default data (the patcorttemplate file) was missing.

The built in qbe query generation routine is a bit wonky it seems and won't always reselect this record properly. Hence, under some circumstances we could generate a record, add it, and then ask QBE to display it and QBE would respond by, well, claiming it didn't exist. So now we pass in a query so that QBE won't have to figure out on its own how to reselect the record it already has.

descript.descript: add variable for task format when pd enabled
Schedule Maintenance supporting for PD Request
Fixed cm3r source query on query.generate as number in cm3r is now a character data type.
Cleaned up a possible error state if some default data (the patcorttemplate file) was missing.

The built in qbe query generation routine is a bit wonky it seems and won't always reselect this record properly. Hence, under some circumstances we could generate a record, add it, and then ask QBE to display it and QBE would respond by, well, claiming it didn't exist. So now we pass in a query so that QBE won't have to figure out on its own how to reselect the record it already has.
